short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WordPress Detector will detect instantly if the site in your current tab is made using WordPress!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WordPress Detector will detect instantly if the site in your current tab is made using WordPress!
Tired of always having to check developer console or source code to see if a site is made with WordPress? Simply pin the WordPress Detector extension and it will automatically display if the site open in your current tab uses WordPress!
